description.value: You've dabbled in minor magical abilities. Choose arcane, divine, occult, or primal magic, and gain two cantrips from the common cantrips that are available in that tradition. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Cast a Spell]{Cast a Spell} activity, your key spellcasting ability is Charisma, and you're trained in spell attack rolls and DCs for the tradition you chose.
